channel.title: New mod crown?
channel.description:
Hello, i have a simple question here. How do i add another crown image in chat (for forum mods)
Currently i have the 2 default crowns (admin and mod): [IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/jjmod.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/ppmod.gif[/img]
I want to add this crown to the chat for forum mods:[img]http://www.runescape.com/img/forum/crown_green.gif[/img]
is there a possible way to do this? if so, please tell me how below

item.title: New mod crown?
item.dc:creator: @metal_k0 metal k0
item.description:
@metal_k0 wrote:

Well, first of all you’d have to make something like a donater ; but then forum mod. second you will have to add the crown image into Spirits (not sure). But I think there are severals tutorials for this… O.O

Read full topic
